name: nxus-web
description: Base theme, template, and MVC support for Nxus applications

scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register -R spec src/test/*.js src/modules/**/test/*.js
scripts.compile: babel src --out-dir lib --ignore src/modules/web-theme-default/template/js/*,src/modules/web-theme-default/template/dist/*,src/modules/web-theme-default/template/bower_components/*; cp -r src/modules/web-theme-default/template lib/modules/web-theme-default/; cp -r src/templates lib/
scripts.build-docs: export NAME=`npm view . name`; export VERSION=`npm view . version`; documentation readme ./src/*.js ./src/modules/*/*.js --name $NAME --project-version $VERSION --readme-file ./README.md -s $NAME
scripts.publish-docs: npm run build-docs && git add ./README.md && git commit -m 'Updated README API Docs' && git push
